description: Comfort is never a question when it comes to the Men's Merino Sport Wind Boxer Brief. Experience the best of both worlds with the comfort of Merino and the durability of recycled polyester. Plus, the added windproof front panel increases protection from the elements, so every adventure starts and ends comfortably.
name: Smartwool Wind Boxer Brief - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester. Overlay Front
